name: webjack
description: A library to connect to an Arduino microcontroller from a website via serial over the audio jack, using WebRTC.

scripts.postinstall: if [ -f node_modules/webrtc-adapter/out/adapter.js ]; then cp node_modules/webrtc-adapter/out/adapter.js examples/; fi && if [ -f node_modules/webrtc-adapter/out/adapter.js ]; then cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js examples/; fi

author: Public Lab
